survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Snack Box Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on subscription-based snack box services to understand satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a snack box service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a snack box service?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a snack box service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a snack box service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of snacks included in your subscription box?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of snacks included in your subscription box?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your snack box service?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to capture detailed feedback. Encourage respondents to be specific.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your snack box service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your snack box service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your snack box service to a friend or colleague?
